a <- 42
A <- a * 2  # R is case sensitive
print(a)
cat(A, "\n") # "84" is concatenated with "\n"
if(A>a) # true, 84 > 42
{
  cat(A, ">", a, "\n")
} 
[1] 42
84 
84 > 42


Square <- function(x) {
  return(x^2)
}

print(Square(4))
print(Square(x=4)) # same thing
[1] 16
[1] 16

n <- floor(runif(1000)*10)
t <- table(n)
barplot(t)
